mapper.insert: insert into single_user (user_id, user_password, user_nickname, user_name, user_profile, user_birthday, user_gender, user_phone, user_zipcode,user_address, user_addressdetail,user_joindate,user_outdate,user_statecode) values(#{userId}, #{userPassword},#{userNickname},#{userName},#{userProfile},to_date(#{userBirthday},'MMDDYYYY'), #{userGender},#{userPhone},#{userZipcode},#{userAddress},#{userAddressDetail},#{userJoindate},#{userOutdate},#{userStatecode})
